notificationsBody: View and customize which on-site notifications you receive by selecting the bell icon at the top of the navigation.
notificationsRecommendedBody: Get notified of global recommendations and series you’ve followed.
notificationsNewEpisodeBody: Get notified when a new episode is available of a series you follow. Manage “Following” below or view all notifications
homepagePromotionsDesc: Show trailers and announcements for upcoming content and events that show up at the top of your home page.
videoPlayerInfoDesc: Show or hide video player information.
languageSettingsDescription: Choose preferred website and content languages.
displaySettingsDescription: Customize your viewing experience on your home page and video player based on your preferences.
interestsSettingsHeader: Which topics interest you? Tailor your experience based on your interests.  Select 1 to 10 topics to improve your recommendations.
hideContentConfirmation: ${ contentTitle } has been removed from your recommendations.
communicationsBody: Manage email communications about new videos, live events, and member spotlights.
